data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Matabeleland South, Zimbabwe so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Matabeleland South, Zimbabwe
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Matabeleland South, Zimbabwe. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 32 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Matabeleland South, Zimbabwe.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Matabeleland South, Zimbabwe that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Matabeleland South, Zimbabwe a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 352,948 people in the state of Matabeleland South who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Matabeleland South, Zimbabwe to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.section_summary:
the state of Matabeleland South, Zimbabwe has a population of 683,900.

We estimate Matabeleland South has 172,482 people who might know Jesus, 352,948 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 158,469 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 172,482 believers in Matabeleland South and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
